original_text: And if a man shall lie with a woman having her sickness, and shall uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be cut off from among their people.
korean_text: 누구든지 월경 중의 여인과 동침하여 그의 하체를 범하면 남자는 그 여인의 근원을 드러냈고 여인은 자기의 피 근원을 드러내었음인즉 둘 다 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: And if a man shall lie with a woman
and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood
and both of them shall be cut off
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 둘 다 끊어지게 될 것이다
